text: This is a list of flag bearers who have represented Azerbaijan at the Olympics.Azerbaijan . Olympics at Sport-Reference.com Sports Reference LLC. Accessed 25 October 2011. Flag bearers carry the national flag of their country at the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games. # Event year Season Flag bearer Sport 14 2022 Winter Figure skating 13 2020 Summer Taekwondo 13 2020 Summer Judo 12 2018 Winter Alpine skiing 11 2016 Summer Boxing 10 2014 Winter Official 9 2012 Summer Judo 8 2010 Winter Figure skating official 7 2008 Summer Greco-Roman wrestling 6 2006 Winter Ice dancing 5 2004 Summer Weightlifting 4 2002 Winter Figure skating 3 2000 Summer Freestyle wrestling 2 1998 Winter Figure skating 1 1996 Summer Judo ==Related pages== *Azerbaijan at the Olympics ==References== Category:Olympics-related lists Category:Sport in Azerbaijan Olympics Category:Lists of Azerbaijani people
title: List of flag bearers for Azerbaijan at the Olympics
